problem.markdown:
1. A minimal valence basis set is the one in which () Always gives lower energy () Is optimized for small molecules (x) Contains one basis function for each atomic orbital () None of the above
2. Which of the following basis sets do not have the polarization functions () 6-31G* () 6-31G(d) (x) 3-21G () None of the above
3.In the context of quantum chemistry , UHF stands for () Ultra High Frequency (x) Unrestricted Hatree Fock () Under Half Full () Unlimited Hamiltonian function
4. What do MP2 and B3LYP levels have in common (x) They are all post-Hartree-Fock techniques () They are all size-extensive techniques () They are all techniques which include electron correlation () They are all based on density functional theory
5. The transition state can be characterised by (x) One imaginary frequency () All positive frequencies () All negative frequencies () None of the above
6. The number of normal modes for a non-linear molecule of 'n' atoms is () 3n-4 () 3n-5 (x) 3n-6 () 3n
